allInfo.content: Experience a perfect blend of nature and comfort at Wind Paradise, offering cosy Mongolian-style homestays and wooden lodges nestled alongside UNESCO World Heritage Kinabalu Park, providing a serene atmosphere and captivating adventures in Kundasang, complemented by stargazing and memorable moments on the BBQ and relaxation deck.

settings.tnc:
Please read carefully.
Number of Persons
  • The term 'Number of Persons' refers to the total number of individuals, including children above 12 years old.
  • Bookings should be made based on the accurate number of persons intending to stay.
  • Any additional individuals in your room after 9pm will be subject to applicable charges.
  • Children below 12 years old are considered complimentary and can be excluded in the headcount.
  • Guests are not permitted to take any of the provided chalet equipment.
  • Please note that it doesn't imply unlimited accommodation for more than 2 children.
House Rules
  • Guests are prohibited from accommodating extra persons in their room. Visitors arriving after 9pm will incur an additional charge of MYR 50 per person.
  • Cooking is only allowed in designated areas and not within the rooms due to potential fire hazards.
  • Non-halal food, Smoking, Durian, Jackfruit (Nangka), Mangosteen and pets are strictly not allowed anywhere within the premises.
  • Kindly refrain from creating loud disturbances, particularly between the hours of 10pm and 7am.
  • Please observe the designated check-in time of 3pm to 9pm and check-out time of 9am to 11am.
  • If you require a different timing, please inform us in advance, but please note that check-in or check-out arrangements beyond midnight are not accepted.
Cancellation Policy
  • All prepaid bookings are non-refundable and non-transferable.
  • Cancellation requests will not be entertained once the booking is confirmed.
  • Should you need to make any amendments, please provide a notice of at least 30 days prior to the scheduled date, subject to room availability.
  • Failure to arrive for your reservation will result in forfeiture of the payment.
Please Take Note
  • Always close the gate when entering or leaving the homestay to prevent animals (dogs) from entering.
  • Avoid making noise or using sound amplification devices that disturb neighbors after 10 PM.
  • Only halal food and drinks are allowed; alcohol is not permitted.
  • Prohibited items such as explosives, bombs, bullets, drugs, and marijuana are strictly not allowed.
  • Before checking out, please ensure you haven't left any personal belongings behind. Any forgotten items will be disposed of.
  • During your stay, the homestay management will not be held responsible for the loss of your valuable belongings.
